original: A list of top 30 frequently asked  Microsoft Azure Interview Questions and answers  are given below.
result: Here are the top 30 commonly asked interview questions and corresponding answers about Microsoft Azure.

original: It is a platform where we can store and access our data over the internet. We can store and access our data from anywhere in the world.
result: Cloud computing is a service offered online that allows for the storage and retrieval of data. It provides access to data from anywhere in the world, making it easy to store and access information from any location.

original: The Azure Cloud service offers multiple web applications in Azure; it categorizes the services and allows us the flexible scaling for our use. The Azure cloud service was launched in the year 2010. It is a dynamic cloud platform that offers development, data storage, service hosting, and service management.
result: The Azure Cloud service is a versatile and comprehensive platform that offers various web applications for development, data storage, service hosting, and management. It was introduced in 2010 and has since provided flexible scaling options for its users. The service is dynamic and diverse, allowing for a range of applications to be hosted on it.

original: Azure Resource Manager is used to manage resources in Microsoft Azure. It is used to deploy, manage, and delete all the resources together using a simple JSON script.
result: Azure Resource Manager is a powerful tool for the management of Microsoft Azure resources. It enables users to easily deploy, manage and delete resources through a JSON script.

original: Microsoft released SDKs for both Java and Ruby to allow applications written in those languages to place calls to the Azure Service Platform API to the AppFabric Service.
result: SDKs for Java and Ruby have been developed by Microsoft to enable developers to make calls to the Azure Service Platform API for the AppFabric Service. These SDKs will allow developers to write applications in Java and Ruby that interact with Microsoft's cloud services.

original: Roles are nothing, but the servers are layman terms. Servers are managed, load-balanced, platform as a Service virtual machines that work together to achieve a common goal.
result: In simple terms, roles refer to servers, which are employed to achieve a shared objective. These servers are virtual machines that are managed, platform as a Service, and load-balanced to function together.

original: These roles are divided into three parts
result: The responsibilities involved in this position are categorized into three segments.

original: It is an Azure compute resource that we can use to deploy and manage a set of identical VMs. It is easy to build large-scale services that target big compute, big data, and containerized workloads if all the VMs configured the same.
result: The Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets is a useful tool for managing multiple identical VMs in an organized manner. It simplifies the deployment and management of large-scale services, such as those that require big compute or big data capabilities. By ensuring that all VMs are configured uniformly, it makes it easier for users to run containerized workloads on a large scale.

original: Windows Azure has the following three principal segments:
result: There are three main categories that make up Windows Azure.

original: Windows Azure Compute: It gives a code that can be managed by the hosting environment. It provides the benefit of calculation through parts. It consists of three types of roles - Web Role, Worker Role, and VM Role.
result: Windows Azure Compute is a feature that enables a code that can be managed by the hosting environment. It delivers the advantage of carrying out calculations through various parts. This feature is composed of three types of roles which include the Web Role, Worker Role, and VM Role.

original: Windows Azure Storage: It gives four types of Storage services - Queue, Tables, Blobs, and Windows Azure Drives (VHD)
result: Windows Azure Storage provides a range of storage services, including Queue, Tables, Blobs, and Windows Azure Drives (VHD).

original: Windows Azure AppFabric: AppFabric provides five services - Service bus, Access, Caching, Integration, and Composite.
result: AppFabric is a platform offered by Microsoft which consists of five key services: Access, Caching, Integration, Service bus, and Composite. These services aim to improve the functionality of cloud-based applications and offer a range of benefits to users.

original: Azure provides the scaling of the services automatically when needed. It depends upon the use, time, and traffic that comes to our application. For example - The traffic will be higher during the examination on any exam-related application or website. Then Azure will automatically modify the setting and provide the resources as required.
result: Azure has the ability to automatically scale its services depending on the demand and traffic it receives. This means that it can adjust its settings and allocate more resources as needed based on various factors such as time of day and the usage of an application. For instance, during an exams season, an educational app or website will experience an increase in traffic. Azure will recognise this and automatically provide additional resources to support the increased demand.

original: A storage key is an authentication method that can be used to validate access for the storage service account to control data based on our prerequisites. We have an alternative to give a primary access key and a secondary access key. The main reason for using a secondary access key is to avoid downtime to the application or website.
result: A storage key is an authentication method used to verify access to the storage service account, ensuring data is controlled based on specified requirements. Users can choose to provide a primary and secondary access key. The secondary key is useful in preventing downtime to the website or application.

original: Microsoft Azure SQL database is a way to get associated with cloud services where we can store our database into the cloud. It has a similar component of SQL Server, i.e., high accessibility, versatility, and security in the core.
result: Microsoft Azure SQL database is a cloud-based service that allows us to store our database on the cloud. It shares similar features as that of SQL Server, such as high availability, flexibility, and security.

original: A cmdlet is a lightweight command that can be used as a part of the Microsoft Azure PowerShell environment. The cmdlets are summoned by the Azure PowerShell that automates the script, which is in the command line. Azure PowerShell runtime additionally invokes them automatically through Azure PowerShell APIs.
result: A cmdlet in Microsoft Azure is a small command that operates in the Azure PowerShell environment. These cmdlets can be called on by Azure PowerShell, allowing for the automation of scripts within the command line. Azure PowerShell also has the ability to activate cmdlets automatically through APIs.

original: The migration assistant tool examines our IIS installation and recognizes the sites that can be migrated to the cloud, featuring any components which can't be relocated or not supported by the platform. This tool similarly creates websites and databases provided under the given Azure membership.
result: The migration assistant is a helpful tool that analyzes the configuration of our IIS server to identify websites that can be moved to the cloud. It will also identify any components that are not supported or cannot be relocated to the cloud platform. Additionally, it can create new websites and databases within our Azure subscription.

original: The SLA ensures that when we send two or more role instances for each role. Access to our cloud service will be maintained with an accuracy of 99.95 % of the time. The identification and re-correction activities will be started 99.9 % of the time whenever a role instance's procedure is not running.
result: The SLA guarantees that our cloud service will have a consistent uptime of 99.95% when we deploy multiple role instances for each role. In case a role instance's process is not running, a fix will be initiated with 99.9% accuracy.

original: Availability Set is a grouping of Azure Virtual Machines. The availability set allows the Azure cloud to build and understand how the application for a user is constructed to provide availability and redundancy.
result: An Availability Set is a collection of Azure virtual machines that are grouped together based on their specific configuration. This grouping enables Azure to ascertain how the user's application is structured, which ensures optimal availability and redundancy.

original: In case of a drive failure, we should follow these steps:
result: If a drive stops working, there are specific actions that must be taken in order to address the issue.

original: Unmount the drive, which allows the Azure storage object to function without fault.
result: To prevent any errors, it is necessary to dismount the drive to enable proper functioning of the Azure storage component.

original: In the case of replacement, we will format and remount the drive.
result: If a replacement is required, the drive will undergo formatting and remounting.

original: We can represent our network within the cloud using VNet. VNet logically isolates our instances launched in the cloud, from the rest of our resources. The various power state of a Virtual Machine is: Running, Starting, Stopping, Deallocating, etc.
result: To establish a secure network infrastructure in the cloud, we can utilize VNet which provides a logical isolation for our cloud instances from other resources. Virtual Machines can have varying power states including Running, Starting, Stopping, and Deallocating.

original: A network security group allows us to manage the network traffic to NIC or subnets etc. The network load will be distributed as needed if it is connected wisely.
result: Managing network traffic to NIC(s) or subnets is simplified with the help of network security groups. Proper implementation ensures efficient distribution of network load.

original: Cspack is a command-line tool, which is used to generate a service package file. It helps us to prepare an application for deployment, either in compute emulator or Microsoft Windows Azure.
result: Cspack is a useful tool that enables the creation of a service package file via the command line. Such a file is crucial in readying an application for deployment on either compute emulator or Microsoft Windows Azure.

original: The two types of blobs in Azure are:
result: Azure offers two types of object storage called "blobs". These include Block blobs, which are made up of blocks of data and are best suited for storing large files, and Page blobs, which are optimized for random read and write operations and are commonly used for virtual machine disk images.

original: No, if we want our VM to be part of an availability set, then we need to create the VM within the set.
result: To include our VM as a member of an availability set, we must construct the virtual machine within the set.

original: In Azure, each data disk can be up to 1 TB. The number of disks we can use depends upon the size of the virtual machine. Azure Managed Disks are the recommended disk storage offering to use with Azure Virtual Machines for persistent storage of data. We can use multiple Managed Disks with each Virtual Machine.
result: Azure offers the ability to attach data disks to virtual machines for persistent data storage. The maximum size for each data disk is 1 TB, with the number of disks allowed depending on the virtual machine size. To optimize storage performance, it is recommended to use Azure Managed Disks. Multiple Managed Disks can be used with each virtual machine.

original: It is a cloud search-as-a-service solution that delegates server and infrastructure management to Microsoft, leaving us with a ready-to-use service that we can populate with our data and then use to add search to our web or mobile application. Azure search allows us to easily add a robust search experience to our applications using a simple REST API or .NET SDK without managing search infrastructure or becoming an expert in search.
result: Azure Search is a service offered by Microsoft that provides cloud-based search capabilities to businesses. With Azure Search, companies can easily incorporate search functionality into their web or mobile applications using a REST API or .NET SDK. The service takes care of server and infrastructure management, allowing businesses to simply populate it with their data and begin using it. As a result, companies can provide their users with a seamless and sophisticated search experience without having to become search experts or manage complex infrastructure.

original: Service Fabric enables us to build applications that consist of microservices. Stateless micro-service doesn't maintain a mutable state outside a request. Azure Cloud Service's worker role is an example of a stateless service. Stateful microservice maintains a mutable, authoritative state beyond the request and its response.
result: Service Fabric is a platform that allows developers to create microservices-based applications. Microservices can be categorized as either stateless or stateful. A stateless microservice does not store any information between requests while a stateful microservice does store information in a mutable state beyond the request and response. An Azure Cloud Service's worker role is an example of a stateless microservice.

original: A web role in Azure is a virtual machine instance running Microsoft IIS Web server that can accept and respond to HTTP or HTTPS requests.
result: An Azure web role is a type of virtual machine that uses Microsoft IIS Web server to handle incoming HTTP or HTTPS requests. It provides the means to accept and respond to web traffic.

original: It is not supported by the Azure portal. We cannot use Azure Resource Manager to deploy a Virtual machine into a virtual network which was created using classic deployment.
result: The Azure portal does not provide support for deploying Virtual machines using Azure Resource Manager into virtual networks that were created using classic deployment.

original: Options for storing data includes:
result: Different possibilities to keep and manage information encompass:

original: Redis cache is an open-source, in-memory data structure store, which is used as a database, cache, and message broker. Azure Redis Cache resembles the famous open-source Redis cache. It provides access to a secure and dedicated Redis cache that is managed by Microsoft and accessible from any application inside Azure.
result: Redis cache is a widely-used data structure store that can function as a message broker, cache, and database, and it is open-source. Azure Redis Cache is a service that is similar to Redis cache and offers access to a custom on-demand and dedicated Redis cache, which is securely managed by Microsoft. This cache can be accessed from any application within the Azure environment.

original: It is a fully managed, open-source, compatible in-memory data store to power fast and scalable applications.
result: The described technology is a data storage system that is open-source and fully managed. It operates in-memory to enable the creation of fast and scalable applications.
